description: The file defines functions responsible for generating C++ header and source files for JSON-RPC APIs based on schema input. It includes functions for creating API headers, generating classes, enums, version info, stubs, and RPC code, with logging and file management.

methods.name: CreateApiHeader(log, source_name, path, headers)
methods.description: Generates a C++ header file with JSON-RPC API definitions, including headers and namespace setup, based on provided headers list.

methods.name: Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
methods.description: Main function that processes a JSON schema to generate corresponding C++ code such as classes, enums, version info, stubs, and RPC implementations based on flags and schema content.

ctags.name: Create
ctags.pattern: /^def Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs/
ctags.signature: (log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
